title: Mexicali Day 1 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Slowly I have to return to normality; I spend most of my day working with Jesus Olivas in Drupal Console project.

In general we work defining next steps to try to achieve the version 1.0.0 stable for Drupal Console, and also I start my diligences to try to attend DrupalCon Dublin, like pay my ticket, request a visa letter and apply for a grant to attend this event.

At the end of the day, we went with Jesusâ€™s family to a North Mexican Grill, and we walk a little bit in Jesus alma mater.

Walking
